snippet: Radio City Music Hall’s resident dance company is using its first spring show since 1997 to try a new range of movements beyond its traditional kick lines.
abstract: Radio City Music Hall resident dance company, Rockettes, are using first spring show since 1997 to try new range of movements beyond traditional kick lines; Linda Haberman, Rockettes' artistic director, has made series of stylistic changes to troupe since she took position in 2006.
lead_paragraph: Radio City Music Hall’s resident dance company is using its first spring show since 1997 to try a new range of movements beyond its traditional kick lines.

headline.main: Sign of a New Spring in Rockettes’ Steps
headline.print_headline: Sign of a New Spring in Rockettes’ Steps
